formattedAddress: 526 E 20th St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 526 E 20th St, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text:
I hired LushLife for my wedding photography. Blaga was extremely easy to work with. She answered every email and text quickly and listened to all my requests with a professional yet friendly nature.
On the day of, she traveled to 2 locations and captured every moment that we hoped for. We are really happy with the quick turnaround. We received our photo files within days and loved the finished product.
I would highly recommend for your special event. Thank you Blaga!

text.text:
I hired LushLife for my wedding photography. Blaga was extremely easy to work with. She answered every email and text quickly and listened to all my requests with a professional yet friendly nature.

I would highly recommend for your special event. Thank you Blaga!

originalText.text: I wish I could give 100 stars instead of 5!!  Blaga and her amazing team helped to make our wedding amazing!!! To me, pictures and video are two of the most important aspects because most spend a good amount of time taking pictures on your wedding day and you and your family will be looking back at those pictures to remember your special day forever!  We have received countless compliments on our pictures and videos from our guests and social media friends.  My husband and I considered at least 4 or 5 other photographers before picking Lush Life Film.  The moment I called Blaga I felt that she really cares.  We met the next day and had no doubt that she and her team will be capturing our big day.  I absolutely loved how all pictures and video came out.  The best part is that Blaga and her team were so nice, down to earth, and made us feel so comfortable!  As a bride and groom, your are often pulled in so many directions on your big day between your guests and photographer you almost forget to breath, relax and enjoy yourselves.  Blaga and her team made our day so much easier and enjoyable.  They were SUPER ORGANIZED and knew exactly how much time we needed to spend taking pictures and how we wanted them, we had backup plans for different scenarios and it worked out perfectly!!  And, best of all... we got my pictures and video so FAST!! The level of PROFESSIONALISM Blaga and her team showed us was exceptional.  It keeps the fun of the wedding going on for longer when you have your pictures and video to enjoy!!  A big thank you to Lush Life Film for capturing the precious moments that we can still enjoy.

originalText.text: I had such a great experience with Lush Life Film. Blaga has such an artistic eye and was always scanning for great picture backdrops while being attentive to our requests. Our wedding day composed of both an American wedding and a Chinese banquet; Blaga was there through it all and embraced our culture wonderfully. She really captured the happiness and love created on that day. I can't recommend her enough and will definitely have her capture more happy memories in the future!

text.text: I had such a great experience with Lush Life Film. Blaga has such an artistic eye and was always scanning for great picture backdrops while being attentive to our requests. Our wedding day composed of both an American wedding and a Chinese banquet; Blaga was there through it all and embraced our culture wonderfully. She really captured the happiness and love created on that day. I can't recommend her enough and will definitely have her capture more happy memories in the future!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Blaga & Lush Life Films for photography services. The response to my initial inquiry happened almost immediately. Over 25 emails exchanged; all questions answered. When I finally met Blaga at the shoot, she was attentive & welcoming, and her suggestions for location worked well, as mentioned in the email exchange. Finally, I thought it impressive that her husband assisted – (good teamwork!). I would use Lush Life Films again. Thanks, Blaga!

text.text: I highly recommend Blaga & Lush Life Films for photography services. The response to my initial inquiry happened almost immediately. Over 25 emails exchanged; all questions answered. originalText.text: Hiring Blaga and Dimi (Lush Life Film) for our photography and videography was the best decision for our wedding! They flew down to FL from NY to capture our day and some extras that we planned (horseback riding with our parents). They were responsive, professional, and “invisible”. My friends said they were everywhere but they did it in a way that didn’t distract from our day or experience. They had great attitudes and were as excited for our day as we were. Their equipment was top of the line and they even used a drone to get amazing overhead footage! I am so happy with our decision to choose them! Don’t hesitate to go with them, they are amazing!!!
